# [Interview #1052: WOR Signing Table Q&A, Entry #58](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1052#58)

#### Question

Is there a difference between the Shardplate of the Radiants and the current Shardplate?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
